full_text: The recall drive means Gavin Newsom will spend the year campaigning rather than governing, at a time when California has urgent needs https://t.co/QdpXcOz8f0

localize.full_text: 罢免行动意味着加文-纽森将用一年的时间来竞选而不是执政，而此时加州有迫切的需求https://t.co/QdpXcOz8f0。
